title: Particle motion from x(t) part - a

content.description: A particle starts at time t=0 and moves along the x-axis so that its position at any time t ≥ 0 is given by x(t)=(t−1)3(2t−3) .
content.question: Find the velocity of the particle at any time t ≥ 0.

frqParts.text: Find the velocity of the particle at any time t ≥ 0.

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
